item.title: 欧盟再次暂停在世贸组织起诉中国经济胁迫案
item.description: 根据世界贸易组织网站上的一份文件，欧盟已重新暂停在世界贸易组织起诉中国针对立陶宛的经济胁迫指控。【原文：The European Union has re-suspended its case against China at the World Trade Organization over allegations of economic coercion targeting Lithuania, according to a filing on the WTO website.】

item.title: 来自哥伦比亚的情人节玫瑰在关税恐慌后幸免于难
item.description:
关于美国驱逐出境的争论几乎使世界第二大花卉出口国最赚钱的季节之一毁于一旦

。【原文：

A spat over deportations from the US nearly derailed one of the most profitable seasons for the world’s No. 2 flower exporter

】

item.title: 大规模抗议为何考验塞尔维亚的长期统治者
item.description: 塞尔维亚各地发生的大规模抗议活动暴露了亚历山大-武契奇总统长达十多年的统治中存在的裂痕。【原文：Mass protests across Serbia have exposed the cracks in the more than decade-long rule of President Aleksandar Vucic.】

item.title: 私募股权投资回报在再平衡中超越私募信贷
item.description: 根据道富公司（State Street Corp.）的数据，私募股权投资的回报率在第三季度超过了私募信贷的回报率，一些人认为这是两个市场之间长期再平衡的迹象。【原文：Private equity returns overtook those offered by private credit in the third quarter, according to data from State Street Corp., in what some see as a sign of a longer-term rebalancing between the two markets.】

item.title: 袭击后俄罗斯乌斯季卢加的石油运输似乎暂停
item.description: 流经俄罗斯波罗的海港口乌斯季卢加（Ust-Luga）的石油似乎暂停了流动，佐证了基辅关于无人机成功袭击一个泵站的说法。【原文：Oil flows through Russia’s Baltic Sea port of Ust-Luga appeared to pause, backing up Kyiv’s claims of a successful drone strike on a pumping station.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的人工智能在数天内受到 "数百家 "公司的限制
item.description: 据受雇帮助保护其系统的网络安全公司称，世界各地的公司和政府机构正在采取行动，限制其员工使用中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 最近发布的工具。【原文：Companies and government agencies around the world are moving to restrict their employees’ access to the tools recently released by the Chinese artificial-intelligence startup DeepSeek, according to the cybersecurity firms hired to help protect their systems.】

item.title: 欧洲央行采取行动后，丹麦下调关键利率以维护货币联系汇率制
item.description: 丹麦中央银行将基准利率下调了四分之一个百分点，与欧洲的中央银行保持一致，以维持克朗与欧元的挂钩。【原文：Denmark’s central bank trimmed its benchmark rate by a quarter point, mirroring its European counterpart to maintain the krone’s peg to the euro.】

item.title: 巴西主要谷物码头火灾得到控制
item.description: 经过消防员数小时的奋力扑救，巴西一个主要谷物铁路终点站的火灾已得到控制。【原文：A fire at a major grains rail terminal in Brazil has been brought under control after firefighters battled the blaze for several hours.】

item.title: 安巴尼家族收购伦敦板球队 "欧华无敌 "的股份
item.description: 在私募股权公司和硅谷高管的关注下，亿万富翁安巴尼家族赢得了伦敦奥瓦尔无敌板球队股份的竞标。【原文：The billionaire Ambani family won the bidding battle for a stake in the Oval Invincibles cricket team in London, after interest from private equity firms and Silicon Valley executives.】

item.title: DeepSeek 事件后，OpenAI 的 Altman 敦促美国支持人工智能投资
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）向美国决策者介绍了继续大力投资实体基础设施以支持未来人工智能发展的必要性，几天前，围绕中国后起之秀 DeepSeek 的热潮使人们对人工智能支出产生了新的怀疑。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman briefed US policymakers on the need to continue investing heavily in physical infrastructure to support future artificial intelligence development, days after the frenzy around Chinese upstart DeepSeek cast new doubt on AI spending.】

item.title: 德国两年期收益率下滑，交易员推高欧洲央行降息押注
item.description: 在政策制定者如期下调借贷成本并将其当前的货币政策立场描述为限制性政策之后，交易商加大了对欧洲央行今年降息的押注，德国债券收益率因此下滑。【原文：German bond yields slumped as traders upped bets on interest-rate cuts from the European Central Bank this year, after policymakers lowered borrowing costs as expected and described their current monetary policy stance as restrictive.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称保加利亚趋同进程进展顺利
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，保加利亚在达到加入欧元区标准的进程中 "进展顺利"。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said Bulgaria is “well advanced” in the process of meeting the criteria for joining the euro.】

item.title: 据 DI 报道，Northvolt 律师威胁起诉部分债权人
item.description: Northvolt AB 在美国的指定破产律师已致函瑞典的债权人，威胁称如果他们不向公司归还被瑞典执法局扣押的资金，将采取法律行动。【原文：Northvolt AB’s appointed bankruptcy lawyers in the US have sent a letter to creditors in Sweden threatening legal action if they don’t return to the company funds seized by the country’s Enforcement Authority.】

item.title: 投资者没有想到的即将到来的人工智能矛盾
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美国住宅待售量自 7 月以来首次下降
item.description: 由于借贷成本和房价居高不下，美国成本最高的地区尤其受到冲击，上个月美国房屋待售量出现了自 7 月份以来的首次下降。【原文：Pending sales of US homes declined last month for the first time since July, as high borrowing costs and prices especially hit the costliest parts of the country.】

item.title: 银行在激烈的杠杆贷款市场提供免费服务
item.description: 随着全球经济反弹带动对杠杆贷款的大量需求，为私募股权公司提供服务的投资银行家们开始提供免费交易。【原文：Investment bankers who cater to private equity firms are offering to do deals for free as a global rally drives rampant demand for leveraged loans.】

item.title: 拉加德坚信欧盟央行将回避比特币储备
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，任何欧盟国家都不可能选择将比特币加入其货币储备。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said it’s improbable that any European Union country will choose to add Bitcoin to its monetary reserves.】

item.title: DWS 首席执行官 Hoops 为私人信贷增长缓慢而自责
item.description: DWS 集团首席执行官斯蒂芬-霍普斯（Stefan Hoops）表示，资产管理公司的私人信贷业务增长缓慢，他一个人难辞其咎。【原文：DWS Group Chief Executive Officer Stefan Hoops said he alone is to blame for the slow growth in the asset manager’s private credit business.】

item.title: 尼日利亚液化天然气公司称管道遭破坏影响发货
item.description: 尼日利亚液化天然气有限公司（Nigeria LNG Ltd.）的液化天然气出口因管道遭到人为破坏而受到影响，工厂的天然气供应因此中断。【原文：Nigeria LNG Ltd.’s exports of liquefied natural gas have taken a hit after vandalism damaged pipelines, curtailing gas supplies to its plant.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行是第二家推出与货币挂钩的全球股票的加拿大银行
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）正在涉足一个蓬勃发展的产品类别，在对冲货币波动风险的同时，为全球热门股票提供风险敞口，成为加拿大第二家这样做的银行。【原文：Bank of Montreal is stepping into a booming product category that offers exposure to popular global stocks while hedging against currency volatility, becoming the second Canadian bank to do so.】

item.title: 受消费者推动，2024 年底美国经济 GDP 增长 2.3
item.description: 2024 年底，美国经济稳健增长，这主要得益于消费支出的强劲增长，抵消了波音公司罢工和库存投资大幅减少的拖累。【原文：The US economy expanded at a solid pace at the end of 2024, fueled by a generous tailwind from consumer spending that more than offset drags from a strike at Boeing Co. and much leaner inventory investment.】

item.title: 南非 Eskom 公司获准提价三分之一
item.description: 南非能源监管机构允许国有企业 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 将电费上调 12.7%，远低于这家正努力扭转财务状况、负债累累的公用事业公司所要求的上调幅度。【原文：South Africa’s energy regulator allowed state-owned Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. to raise electricity tariffs by 12.7%, well below the amount requested by the debt-laden utility that’s trying to turn around its finances.】

item.title: Fortress 最新诉讼融资基金的目标是 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，堡垒投资集团（Fortress Investment Group）正寻求为其最新的诉讼融资基金募集约 10 亿美元资金，该集团在诉讼融资领域的实力正日益增强。【原文：Fortress Investment Group is seeking to raise about $1 billion for its latest fund in litigation finance, a sector in which it’s becoming a powerhouse, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 护士被杀后，乌干达宣布苏丹爆发埃博拉疫情
item.description: 乌干达说，埃博拉病毒爆发导致该国首都坎帕拉主要医院的一名 32 岁护士死亡，目前正在对 44 名接触者进行监测。【原文：Uganda said an outbreak of the Ebola virus killed a 32-year-old nurse at the country’s main hospital in the capital, Kampala, and 44 contacts are being monitored.】

item.title: 欧元区经济低迷，欧洲央行第五次降息
item.description: 欧洲央行自 6 月以来第五次下调借贷成本，该地区经济停滞不前，2% 的通胀目标遥遥无期。【原文：The European Central Bank lowered borrowing costs for a fifth time since June, with the region’s economy stalling and the 2% inflation target in reach.】

item.title: 南非央行再次将利率下调四分之一个点
item.description: 南非央行在连续第三次会议上降低了借贷成本，同时警告说通胀前景面临的风险已经增加。【原文：South Africa’s central bank lowered borrowing costs for a third straight meeting, while warning that risks to the inflation outlook have increased.】

item.title: 对冲基金周 "大空头 "交易员重新聚首，做多意愿强烈
item.description: 这是卖空行业目前危险状况的另一个标志，如果需要一个标志的话：在这场由一些最著名人士参与的活动中，几乎没有人持看跌观点。【原文：It’s another sign, if one were needed, of the perilous state of the short-selling industry right now: At an event featuring some of the most famous names in the game, there was hardly a bearish view among them.】

item.title: 罗杰斯盈利超预期，但 2025 年业绩预期较弱
item.description: 罗杰斯通信公司（Rogers Communications Inc）第四季度业绩超出分析师预期，原因是无线服务收入增加，用户购买了更昂贵的设备。【原文：Rogers Communications Inc. beat analysts’ fourth-quarter estimates as wireless service revenue gained and subscribers bought more expensive devices.】

item.title: 技术面显示超买，欧盟碳将面临抛售
item.description: 欧洲碳将下跌，技术指标显示价格可能已经找到了上限，期货超买。【原文：European carbon is set for a decline with technical indicators flashing signs that prices may have found a ceiling with futures overbought.】

item.title: 非洲最富有的国家将为申办一级方程式锦标赛筹资 5000 万美元
item.description: 南非体育部长盖顿-麦肯齐（Gayton McKenzie）在接受采访时表示，南非计划筹集 5000 万美元，为申办一级方程式赛车提供资金支持。【原文：South Africa plans to raise $50 million to help fund a bid to host a Formula 1 race, the country’s sports minister Gayton McKenzie said in an interview.】
